lenders.name: Jaren
lenders.loan_because:
Hello friend,

My names are Jaren Williams,I am a nurse in a private clinic in London UK, I am impressed with the level of clean spiritedness people show in this site, this is why I am hoping to get someone who I can trust over here, as I have been searching for few days now and i am skeptical of whom to chose, though i am left with little choice, as this site is the nearest to the place i can get good person for the dream project of my patient to be accomplished.

I have got some friends here who wanted me to involve them in this quest, but their motive is mostly selfish based other than to render service to humanity, which is contrary to my dream and objectives.


My patient Mr.Rooney Holfman have been struggling painfully with cancer, which has left him battling from different specialist hospitals all around the globe, as it has defied all forms of medical treatment, and the doctors has pronounced that his days are very few and he's so dejected right now.

These are the words of my patient:
  
I want god to be merciful to me and accept my soul so, I have decided to give alms to charity organizations, as I want this to be one of the last good deeds I do on earth. So far, I have distributed grants to some charity organizations in the Muscat, Liberia and Malaysia. Now that my health has deteriorated so badly, I cannot do this myself anymore., I have done the much I can by donating right from my sick bed through several online methods, but this is less effective, I need a representative, who can carry out this as a career, and manage the fund wisely with love of god, to raise a memorial school in my name.

I am seeking reliable partners who can undertake the task of been trusted with my entire life resources to help mankind ,the criteria for the selection process involved in this will be based on evident fact that you have a kind heart.
You will have the responsibility of setting up charity home school in memory of my names, and you will set up school in the deprived neighborhood where you will help to educate the less priviledged, and much more .

So when I searched for this site,I asked him to help donate money for those that needs assistance in their business.

I prefer you reply to my private email below as I don't check this site often.besides the misunderstanding I have with the administrators of this site, who told me this is contrary to the terms of their site. when I approached them to supply me with a credible person.

Email:jaren_willi@yahoo.com

Jaren
